    • getView

      public IViewPart getView(boolean restore)
      Description copied from interface: IViewReference
      Returns the IViewPart referenced by this object. Returns null if the view was not instantiated or it failed to be restored. Tries to restore the view if restore is true.
      Specified by:
      getView in interface IViewReference
      Parameters:
      restore - true to try to restore the view, false otherwise.
      Returns:
      the IViewPart or null.
